We're going to be preparing a Stuffed Rolled
Steak.

A thin, flat cut of beef spread with a savory
stuffing, then rolled, skewered, and braised,

produces an applause-winning main dish that
is particularly easy to serve.

It can be sliced jellyroll fashion and eaten
hot or cold.
The dish is popular throughout Latin America.

In Argentina it is called matambre or "hunger
killer."

The beef roll was originally prepared for
travelers setting out on long journeys.
